name: Ext_R2_DiagnosticOrder_supportingInformation
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.DiagnosticOrder.supportingInformation for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents DiagnosticOrder.supportingInformation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DiagnosticOrder|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Additional clinical information about the patient or specimen that may influence test interpretations.  This includes observations explicitly requested by the producer(filler) to provide context or supporting information needed to complete the order.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.reasonReference` maps to R4B `ServiceRequest.reasonReference`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
